Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: peniwt eyouab piar,iab/t: pidikeoc abba Beca: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf: our holy father the head of the monastery: the righteous Abba Besa: that He may forgive us our sins.
